en.auth.failed: These credentials do not match our records.
en.auth.throttle: Too many login attempts. Please try again in :seconds seconds.

en.passwords.sent: We have emailed your password reset link!
en.passwords.token: This password reset token is invalid.
en.passwords.user: We can't find a user with that email address.

en.validation.accepted_if: The :attribute must be accepted when :other is :value.
en.validation.active_url: The :attribute is not a valid URL.
en.validation.after: The :attribute must be a date after :date.
en.validation.after_or_equal: The :attribute must be a date after or equal to :date.
en.validation.alpha_dash: The :attribute must only contain letters, numbers, dashes and underscores.
en.validation.alpha_num: The :attribute must only contain letters and numbers.
en.validation.before: The :attribute must be a date before :date.
en.validation.before_or_equal: The :attribute must be a date before or equal to :date.

between.array: The :attribute must have between :min and :max items.
between.file: The :attribute must be between :min and :max kilobytes.
between.string: The :attribute must be between :min and :max characters.

en.validation.boolean: The :attribute field must be true or false.
en.validation.date: The :attribute is not a valid date.
en.validation.date_equals: The :attribute must be a date equal to :date.
en.validation.date_format: The :attribute does not match the format :format.
en.validation.declined_if: The :attribute must be declined when :other is :value.
en.validation.digits_between: The :attribute must be between :min and :max digits.
en.validation.distinct: The :attribute field has a duplicate value.
en.validation.doesnt_start_with: The :attribute may not start with one of the following: :values.
en.validation.email: The :attribute must be a valid email address.
en.validation.ends_with: The :attribute must end with one of the following: :values.
en.validation.filled: The :attribute field must have a value.

gt.array: The :attribute must have more than :value items.
gt.file: The :attribute must be greater than :value kilobytes.
gt.string: The :attribute must be greater than :value characters.

gte.array: The :attribute must have :value items or more.
gte.file: The :attribute must be greater than or equal to :value kilobytes.
gte.numeric: The :attribute must be greater than or equal to :value.
gte.string: The :attribute must be greater than or equal to :value characters.

en.validation.in_array: The :attribute field does not exist in :other.
en.validation.ip: The :attribute must be a valid IP address.
en.validation.ipv4: The :attribute must be a valid IPv4 address.
en.validation.ipv6: The :attribute must be a valid IPv6 address.
en.validation.json: The :attribute must be a valid JSON string.

lt.array: The :attribute must have less than :value items.
lt.file: The :attribute must be less than :value kilobytes.
lt.string: The :attribute must be less than :value characters.

lte.array: The :attribute must not have more than :value items.
lte.file: The :attribute must be less than or equal to :value kilobytes.
lte.numeric: The :attribute must be less than or equal to :value.
lte.string: The :attribute must be less than or equal to :value characters.

en.validation.mac_address: The :attribute must be a valid MAC address.

max.array: The :attribute must not have more than :max items.
max.file: The :attribute must not be greater than :max kilobytes.
max.numeric: The :attribute must not be greater than :max.
max.string: The :attribute must not be greater than :max characters.

en.validation.mimes: The :attribute must be a file of type: :values.
en.validation.mimetypes: The :attribute must be a file of type: :values.

min.array: The :attribute must have at least :min items.
min.file: The :attribute must be at least :min kilobytes.
min.string: The :attribute must be at least :min characters.

en.validation.multiple_of: The :attribute must be a multiple of :value.

password.letters: The :attribute must contain at least one letter.
password.mixed: The :attribute must contain at least one uppercase and one lowercase letter.
password.numbers: The :attribute must contain at least one number.
password.symbols: The :attribute must contain at least one symbol.
password.uncompromised: The given :attribute has appeared in a data leak. Please choose a different :attribute.

en.validation.prohibited_if: The :attribute field is prohibited when :other is :value.
en.validation.prohibited_unless: The :attribute field is prohibited unless :other is in :values.
en.validation.prohibits: The :attribute field prohibits :other from being present.
en.validation.required_array_keys: The :attribute field must contain entries for: :values.
en.validation.required_if: The :attribute field is required when :other is :value.
en.validation.required_unless: The :attribute field is required unless :other is in :values.
en.validation.required_with: The :attribute field is required when :values is present.
en.validation.required_with_all: The :attribute field is required when :values are present.
en.validation.required_without: The :attribute field is required when :values is not present.
en.validation.required_without_all: The :attribute field is required when none of :values are present.
en.validation.starts_with: The :attribute must start with one of the following: :values.
en.validation.timezone: The :attribute must be a valid timezone.
en.validation.url: The :attribute must be a valid URL.
en.validation.uuid: The :attribute must be a valid UUID.
